title: Strange lag.
body: Hey, So about a week ago when playing a normal I started having higher ping and lower framrate then usual. I hoped into a custom and had the same issues.  around 40fps, (Usually 60) and 70-600 ping (Normally 60 as well.) (My settings have been unchanged since installation) Anyway I was hoping someone would have something helpful to say.

replies.body: The lag has left! No need to post on this anymore.
Update: The lag has persisted and is continuing to make the game unplayable, still hoping for a solution.

I ran a log report and these were the results. "Your average ping was 83 milliseconds." "Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 2.71%."

As opposed to... "Your average ping was 61 milliseconds." "Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 1.33%.
Unfortunately the WinMTR download would not work. Probably because I am running windows ten. (Not certain)

That ping is crazy high!  It's hard to say if this is a local issue, or if your ISP might be having some hiccups while reaching us.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) in this case so we can get a better overview of what's going on.  

Then download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a route to the NA game server: 104.160.131.1.  Run it for about 5 minutes and let me know the results.
